SIGE

AREA TS MOV FROM 21025KT. TOPS ABV FL450. 
TS ASSOCD WITH T.S. ARTHUR.

AREA 1...FROM 50S DXO-30ESE CLE-30WNW EKN-40NW HMV-ODF-40NNE 
CAE-40NW CHS-40NNW CRG-30ESE PZD-30SSE LGC-30SSE VUZ-30SE 
BWG-CVG-50S DXO 
REF WW 193. 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.

EYW-RSW-30NNE PIE-60WSW CTY-40ESE TLH

BWG-CVG-50S DXO 
REF WW 193. 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM 40ESE TLH-30NNW OMN-40E ORL-30NE PBI-30SSE MIA-50NE 
EYW-RSW-30NNE PIE-60WSW CTY-40ESE TLH 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
==
